trans-unit.source: Represents the logical window that contains one or more instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含一个或多个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" /> 实例的逻辑窗口。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> should not be confused with the concept of a window in Windows Forms or the Win32 API; there is no `HWND` or similar Windows resource that corresponds directly to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> 不应与在 Windows 窗体或 Win32 API; 窗口的概念混淆没有任何`HWND`或类似 Windows 资源，直接对应的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>。

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> provides high-level descriptions of a document's location on a user's screen, as well as methods for interacting with users by way of prompts and dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>上用户的屏幕，以及用于与通过提示和对话框的用户交互的方法提供的文档的位置的高级说明。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> acts as a logical container for a Web page's documents and its metadata, such as the document's location and the capabilities of the Web browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> 充当 Web 页面的文档和其元数据，例如文档的位置和 Web 浏览器的功能的逻辑容器。

trans-unit.source: A Web page consists of a single document, or a `FRAMESET` containing one or more `FRAME` elements, each of which hosts its own document.
trans-unit.target: 一种 Web 页包含单个文档，或者`FRAMESET`包含一个或多个`FRAME`元素，其中每个承载其自己的文档。

trans-unit.source: Web developers use framesets to show logically related pages side by side (for example, a content page next to a navigation page).
trans-unit.target: Web 开发人员使用框架集以显示逻辑上相关的页面并排显示 （例如，内容旁边导航页页）。

trans-unit.source: When a page consists of a single document, you can access it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Document%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>; if the page uses frames, you can access their documents through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Frames%2A> collection, which consists of one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> objects.
trans-unit.target: 当包含单个文档的页面时，你可以访问它通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Document%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>; 如果则页面使用帧，您可以访问其文档，一直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Frames%2A>集合，其中包括一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>对象。

trans-unit.source: When your host the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control in a Windows Forms application, you can choose to interact with the user using standard Windows Forms classes, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>, or you can use methods on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> defined for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 当你的主机<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件在 Windows 窗体应用程序，你可以选择与使用标准 Windows 窗体类，如用户交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>，或者可以在使用方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>针对此用途定义。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Alert%2A> method presents a simple dialog box with custom text and an **OK** button; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Prompt%2A> presents a line of custom text and a text input field to the user; and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Confirm%2A> presents a dialog box with a line of custom text and **OK** and **Cancel** buttons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Alert%2A>方法具有自定义文本中显示一个简单的对话框和**确定**按钮;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Prompt%2A>向用户; 呈现自定义文本和文本输入的字段的行和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Confirm%2A>的自定义文本线显示一个对话框和**确定**和**取消**按钮。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> to open new windows containing new documents.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>打开包含新的文档的新窗口。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> loads the specified URL into the named window, creating it if it does not already exist, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A> always opens its URL in a newly created window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> 将指定的 URL 加载到已命名的窗口中，如果不存在，请创建它，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>始终在新创建的窗口中打开其 URL。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains two methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含两个方法。

trans-unit.source: The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed.
trans-unit.target: 第一个将在名为的窗口中打开 URL `displayWindow`，这便会创建的状态栏显示。

trans-unit.source: The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 第二个在相同的窗口中，打开另一个 URL，但指定应显示仅位置栏。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first.
trans-unit.target: 请注意窗口和显示控件的维度取决于在其上第一次打开 URL。

trans-unit.source: The code example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例要求你的窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to display in the message box.
trans-unit.target: 要在消息框中显示的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box.
trans-unit.target: 显示消息框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> class offers a more powerful version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Alert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>类提供的功能更强大版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Alert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Alert%2A> accepts Unicode text as input, the Internet Explorer script prompt will not display non-Latin language text appropriately on Windows 95, Windows 98, Windows ME or Windows NT due to operating system limitations.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Alert%2A>接受 Unicode 文本作为输入，Internet Explorer 脚本提示符上将不显示非拉丁语言文本适当 Windows 95、 Windows 98、 Windows ME 或 Windows NT 由于操作系统限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [INFO: Internet Explorer Script Prompts and MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[信息： Internet Explorer 脚本将提示和 MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event you want to handle.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the managed code that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 对处理事件的托管代码的引用。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the named HTML DOM event.
trans-unit.target: 为已命名的 HTML DOM 事件添加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You should not attach an event to an HTML document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: 文档完成加载之前，不应将事件附加到 HTML 文档或其对象之一。

trans-unit.source: The earliest you should call this method is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的最早，应调用此方法是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件。

trans-unit.source: Closes the window.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗口。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.IsClosed%2A> property to determine if the window is already closed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.IsClosed%2A>属性来确定是否窗口已关闭。

trans-unit.source: If the window is already closed, this method will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗口已关闭，则此方法将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: When you create new windows using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A> causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建新的 windows 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A>导致 HTML 文档对象模型，以便打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you do not call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A> on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application closes.
trans-unit.target: 如果不调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A>上所有已创建的 windows，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态甚至在你的应用程序关闭后。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens a window, and closes it if the user has not used it in the past five minutes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将打开一个窗口，并将其关闭，如果用户在过去 5 分钟内未使用它。

trans-unit.source: The code example was written under the assumption that your form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `Button1`, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> class named `Timer1`.
trans-unit.target: 编写的代码示例时，假设你的窗体具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`Button1`，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>类名为`Timer1`。

trans-unit.source: To run this example successfully, change the first argument supplied to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A> to a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功运行此示例中，更改提供给第一个自变量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>到有效的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The text to display to the user.
trans-unit.target: 要显示给用户的文本。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box with a message and buttons to solicit a yes/no response.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个包含一则消息和多个按钮的对话框以请求作出“是”/“否”等响应。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user clicked **Yes**; <see langword="false" /> if the user clicked **No** or closed the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户单击“是”，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果用户单击“否”或关闭对话框，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Confirm%2A> displays a modal dialog box; the user will not be able to access the underlying HTML page without first closing this dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Confirm%2A> 显示模式对话框;用户将不能访问而无需先关闭此对话框中的基础的 HTML 页。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Confirm%2A> accepts Unicode text as input, the Internet Explorer script prompt will not display non-Latin language text appropriately on Windows 95, Windows 98, Windows ME or Windows NT due to operating system limitations.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Confirm%2A>接受 Unicode 文本作为输入，Internet Explorer 脚本提示符上将不显示非拉丁语言文本适当 Windows 95、 Windows 98、 Windows ME 或 Windows NT 由于操作系统限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [INFO: Internet Explorer Script Prompts and MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[信息： Internet Explorer 脚本将提示和 MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147)。

trans-unit.source: Copy the following HTML and save it into a form called orderForm.htm:
trans-unit.target: 复制以下 HTML 并将其保存到名为 orderForm.htm 的表单：

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Confirm%2A>对话框中，当用户提交`NewOrderForm`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event you want to handle.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the managed code that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 对处理事件的托管代码的引用。

trans-unit.source: Removes the named event handler.
trans-unit.target: 移除已命名的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML document contained within the window.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗口中包含的 HTML 文档。

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" />, if a document is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果已加载了一个文档，则为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" /> 的有效实例。

trans-unit.source: If this window contains a <c>FRAMESET</c>, or no document is currently loaded, it will return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此窗口包含<c>框架集</c>，或者当前未加载任何文档，它将返回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Document%2A> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 通常，你将访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Document%2A>通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property when you need to access a document within a `FRAME` using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Frames%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要访问内的文档时使用此属性`FRAME`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Frames%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example inspects each document within a page containing frames and creates a table of all of the outgoing hyperlinks from each page for future inspection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查包含框架的页内的所有文档，并从将来检查每个页中创建的所有传出的超链接表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unmanaged interface wrapped by this class.
trans-unit.target: 获取此类包装的非托管接口。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be cast to an <see langword="IHTMLWindow2" />, <see langword="IHTMLWindow3" />, or <see langword="IHTMLWindow4" /> pointer.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，可以强制转换为<see langword="IHTMLWindow2" />， <see langword="IHTMLWindow3" />，或<see langword="IHTMLWindow4" />指针。

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying unmanaged interface pointers to the Document Object Model (DOM) to execute methods not exposed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>.
trans-unit.target: 使用基础非托管的接口指针到文档对象模型 (DOM) 来执行未公开的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>。

trans-unit.source: You must add a referenced to the unmanaged MSHTML.dll in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.DomWindow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你必须添加引用到非托管 MSHTML.dll 以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.DomWindow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Importing a Type Library as an Assembly](~/docs/framework/interop/importing-a-type-library-as-an-assembly.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[导入类型库当作程序集](~/docs/framework/interop/importing-a-type-library-as-an-assembly.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example obtains an `IHTMLWindow2` pointer from a document's window and displays a new document in a modal window.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取`IHTMLWindow2`从文档的指针的窗口，并在一个模式窗口中显示新文档。

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的对象。

trans-unit.source: Tests the object for equality against the current object.
trans-unit.target: 测试对象是否与当前对象相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when script running inside of the window encounters a run-time error.
trans-unit.target: 当窗口内部运行的脚本遇到运行时错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: HTML pages can contain script code, usually written in JScript or VBScript, that executes when a page is loaded.
trans-unit.target: HTML 页面可以包含用 JScript 或 VBScript，当加载页时可以执行通常编写的脚本代码。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Error> occurs whenever a script encounters a run-time error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Error> 脚本遇到运行时错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: Because script code is late-bound, which means that calls against the object are not resolved until run-time, errors can include everything from referencing a null object to calling an undefined property or method.
trans-unit.target: 因为脚本代码位于后期绑定，这意味着，与对象的调用不被解析直到运行时错误可能包括中引用 null 对象到调用未定义的属性或方法的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementErrorEventArgs> to true in order to prevent the native error dialog box in Internet Explorer from displaying.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementErrorEventArgs>为 true，以便防止 Internet 资源管理器中的本机错误对话框显示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关取消事件上传和取消事件的默认操作之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[关于 DHTML 对象模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example traps the error that results when a script on an HTML page attempts to access an object that is not defined in the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例捕获结果时在 HTML 页上的脚本尝试访问文档中未定义的对象的错误。

trans-unit.source: The page must be fully loaded before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Error> event handler is attached, otherwise the example will not work.
trans-unit.target: 此页必须是完全加载之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Error>事件处理程序附加，否则此示例将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Puts the focus on the current window.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点置于当前窗口上。

trans-unit.source: If another window held the focus before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Focus%2A> was called, that window will lose the focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一窗口拥有焦点之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Focus%2A>已调用，该窗口将失去焦点。

trans-unit.source: Do not call focus on an element inside of a window until the window's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Load> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用焦点上一个窗口内的一个元素之前窗口的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Load>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to each of the <c>FRAME</c> elements defined within the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取在网页中定义的每个 <c>FRAME</c> 元素的一个引用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindowCollection" /> of a document's <c>FRAME</c> and <c>IFRAME</c> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindowCollection" />的文档的<c>帧</c>和<c>IFRAME</c>对象。

trans-unit.source: A `FRAME` is a set of windows defined within a `FRAMESET`.
trans-unit.target: A`FRAME`是一套中定义的 windows `FRAMESET`。

trans-unit.source: `FRAME`s enable hosting multiple documents within a single document.
trans-unit.target: `FRAME`s 启用承载单个文档中的多个文档。

trans-unit.source: Each `FRAME` is defined as possessing a certain row and column width, and is position on the page in relation to the other `FRAME`s defined within the `FRAMESET`; the position of a `FRAME` is fixed, although a user may sometimes use the mouse cursor to grow or shrink the `FRAME`.
trans-unit.target: 每个`FRAME`被定义为具有一定行和列宽度，并且是相对于其他页上的位置`FRAME`中定义的 s `FRAMESET`; 的位置`FRAME`固定的虽然用户有时可以使用鼠标游标来增加或缩减`FRAME`。

trans-unit.source: An `IFRAME` is similar to a frame, but it need not be anchored in a fixed position.
trans-unit.target: `IFRAME`是类似于的框架，但它不需要定位在固定位置。

trans-unit.source: Frames will contain one instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> for each `FRAME` or `IFRAME` defined within a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 框架将包含的一个实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>每个`FRAME`或`IFRAME`在网页中定义。

trans-unit.source: The following code example inspects each document within a page containing frames and creates a table of all of the outgoing hyperlinks from each page for future inspection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查包含框架的页内的所有文档，并从将来检查每个页中创建的所有传出的超链接表。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 用作特定类型的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current window obtains user input focus.
trans-unit.target: 在当前窗口获得用户输入焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.GotFocus> will occur for:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.GotFocus> 将出现：

trans-unit.source: The first window in a `FRAMESET` when the `FRAMESET` first loads.
trans-unit.target: 中的第一个窗口`FRAMESET`时`FRAMESET`首次加载。

trans-unit.source: The `FRAME` that last had focus when the window containing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control is brought to the foreground.
trans-unit.target: `FRAME` ，最后具有焦点时窗口包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件置于前台。

trans-unit.source: A `FRAME` clicked by the user, but only if the user's click does not put focus on an element within the window.
trans-unit.target: A`FRAME`单击用户，但只有当用户单击不会将焦点置于窗口内的元素。

trans-unit.source: You cannot cancel the default action for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.GotFocus> event, or prevent it from bubbling.
trans-unit.target: 无法取消的默认操作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.GotFocus>事件，或防止冒泡。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关取消事件上传和取消事件的默认操作之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[关于 DHTML 对象模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.GotFocus> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.GotFocus>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> named `HtmlWindow1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>名为`HtmlWindow1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.GotFocus> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.GotFocus>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object containing the user's most recently visited URLs.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含用户最近访问的 URL 的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlHistory" /> for the current window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlHistory" />当前窗口。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.History%2A> contains all URLs navigated to within the current window, which is referred to as the *navigation stack*, and provides methods for navigating back to those documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.History%2A> 包含在当前窗口中，这被称为导航到的所有 Url*导航堆栈*，并提供用于导航到这些文档的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this window is open or closed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此窗口是处于打开还是关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the window is still open on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此窗口在屏幕上仍然处于打开状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> has been closed by the user or by way of a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A> method, attempting to navigate to a new URL or access the window's document will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>已由用户或通过调用关闭<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A>方法，尝试导航到新 URL 或访问窗口的文档将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether it is safe to call properties and methods on the current window object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以确定它是否是安全地在当前窗口对象上调用属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens a window, and closes it if the user has not used it in the past five minutes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将打开一个窗口，并将其关闭，如果用户在过去 5 分钟内未使用它。

trans-unit.source: The code example requires that your form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `Button1`, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> class named `Timer1`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例要求你窗体具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`Button1`，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>类名为`Timer1`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the window's document and all of its elements have finished initializing.
trans-unit.target: 当窗口的文档及其所有元素完成初始化时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Load> event works similarly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control: it signals that it is safe to access HTML elements inside of the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Load>事件工作原理类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>上的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件： 它发出信号，它是安全的访问 HTML 文档内的元素。

trans-unit.source: You cannot cancel the default action for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 无法取消的默认操作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关取消事件上传和取消事件的默认操作之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[关于 DHTML 对象模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> named `HtmlWindow1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>名为`HtmlWindow1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when user input focus has left the window.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入焦点离开窗口时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.LostFocus> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.LostFocus>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> named `HtmlWindow1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>名为`HtmlWindow1`。

trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.LostFocus>事件。

trans-unit.source: Moves the window to the specified coordinates on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口移动到屏幕上的指定坐标。

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-coordinates of the window's upper-left corner.
trans-unit.target: 窗口左上角的 x 和 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Moves the window to the specified coordinates on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口移动到屏幕上的指定坐标。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A> to move a window off of the visible edge of the screen; this method is also available through script on a Web page, and allowing untrusted script to render windows invisible is not considered secure.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A>到移动从屏幕可见边缘中移出窗口; 此方法还可通过脚本在网页上，并且允许不受信任的脚本来呈现 windows 不可见被视为不安全。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A> will raise an <xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException> if the window you are trying to move and its parent window have different top-level domains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A> 将引发<xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException>如果想要移动的窗口和其父窗口具有不同的顶级域。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are hosting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control pointing to a.adatum.com, create a new window using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A> to display b.adatum.com. In this case, both windows are considered to be part of the same top-level domain, and the exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要承载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制指向 a.adatum.com，创建一个新窗口使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>以显示 b.adatum.com。在这种情况下，这两个窗口被视为是相同的顶级域的一部分，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: However, if you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A> to display www,microsoft.com, the two windows now have different top-level domains, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A> operation will cause the exception to throw.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>若要显示 www,microsoft.com，两个窗口，现在具有不同的顶级域，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A>操作将导致要引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The code trying to execute this operation does not have permission to manipulate this window.
trans-unit.target: 尝试执行此操作的代码没有操作此窗口的权限。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the window's upper-left corner.
trans-unit.target: 窗口左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the window's upper-left corner.
trans-unit.target: 窗口左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Moves the window to the specified coordinates on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口移动到屏幕上的指定坐标。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A> to move a window off of the visible edge of the screen; this method is also available through script on a Web page, and allowing untrusted script to render windows invisible is not considered secure.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A>到移动从屏幕可见边缘中移出窗口; 此方法还可通过脚本在网页上，并且允许不受信任的脚本来呈现 windows 不可见被视为不安全。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A> will raise an <xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException> if the window you are trying to move and its parent window have different top-level domains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A> 将引发<xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException>如果想要移动的窗口和其父窗口具有不同的顶级域。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are hosting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control and it is pointing to a.adatum.com, you create a new window using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A> to display b.adatum.com. In this case, both windows are considered to be part of the same top-level domain, and the exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要承载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制和它所指向的 a.adatum.com，创建新的窗口使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>以显示 b.adatum.com。在这种情况下，这两个窗口被视为是相同的顶级域的一部分，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: However, if you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A> to display www,microsoft.com, the two windows now have different top-level domains, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A> operation will cause the exception to throw.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>若要显示 www,microsoft.com，两个窗口，现在具有不同的顶级域，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.MoveTo%2A>操作将导致要引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The code trying to execute this operation does not have permission to manipulate this window.
trans-unit.target: 尝试执行此操作的代码没有操作此窗口的权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the window.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗口的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the name.
trans-unit.target: 表示名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays or downloads the new content located at the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 显示或下载位于指定 URL 位置的新内容。

trans-unit.source: The resource to display, described by a Uniform Resource Locator.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的资源，由统一资源定位器描述。

trans-unit.source: Displays or downloads the new content located at the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 显示或下载位于指定 URL 位置的新内容。

trans-unit.source: If the `url` parameter points to an HTML page, the page currently displayed in the window will be destroyed and replaced with the new page; any references your application holds to managed DOM objects in the old page will not be valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果`url`参数指向 HTML 页，将销毁当前显示在窗口中的页面，并将其替换为新页面持有; 不能在旧的页中的托管 DOM 对象保存你的应用程序的任何引用。

trans-unit.source: If `url` points to a resource that cannot be displayed by Internet Explorer, the user will be presented with a dialog box asking whether to open the resource outside of the application, save it to disk, or cancel the download operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`url`点到 Internet 资源管理器无法显示的资源，则用户将看到一个对话框，询问你是否要打开在应用程序，保存它以磁盘，或取消下载操作外部资源。

trans-unit.source: The location, specified as a <see cref="T:System.Uri" />, of the document or object to display in the current window.
trans-unit.target: 要在当前窗口中显示的文档或对象的位置，以 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的形式指定。

trans-unit.source: Displays a new document in the current window.
trans-unit.target: 在当前窗口中显示新文档。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Tests the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> 对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both parameters are <see langword="null" />, or if both elements have the same underlying COM interface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个参数都为 <see langword="null" />，或是两个元素具有相同的基础 COM 接口，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equality operator tests the `IUnknown` pointers of the underlying COM objects wrapped by the supplied <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> classes.
trans-unit.target: 相等运算符测试`IUnknown`包装由所提供的基础 COM 对象的指针<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>类。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Tests two <see langword="HtmlWindow" /> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个 <see langword="HtmlWindow" /> 对象是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one but not both of the objects is <see langword="null" />, or the underlying COM pointers do not match; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有两个对象之一为 <see langword="null" />，或基础 COM 指针不匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays a file in the named window.
trans-unit.target: 在已命名的窗口中显示文件。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Locator that describes the location of the file to load.
trans-unit.target: 描述要加载的文件位置的统一资源定位器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the window in which to open the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中打开资源的窗口的名称。

trans-unit.source: This may be a developer-supplied name, or one of the following special values:
trans-unit.target: 它可能是开发人员提供的名称或者下列特殊值之一：

trans-unit.source: <c>_blank</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in a new window.
trans-unit.target: <c>_blank</c>在新窗口中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: Works the same as a call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew(System.String,System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 与调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew(System.String,System.String)" /> 作用相同。

trans-unit.source: <c>_media</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in the Media bar.
trans-unit.target: <c>_media</c>在“媒体”栏中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>_parent</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in the window that created the current window.
trans-unit.target: <c>_parent</c>在创建当前窗口的窗口中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>_search</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in the Search bar.
trans-unit.target: <c>_search</c>在“搜索”栏中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>_self</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in the current window.
trans-unit.target: <c>_self</c>在当前窗口中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>_top</c>: If called against a window belonging to a <c>FRAME</c> element, opens <c>url</c> in the window hosting its <c>FRAMESET</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>_top</c>：如果在属于 <c>FRAME</c> 元素的窗口上调用，则在承载其 <c>FRAMESET</c> 的窗口中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, acts the same as <c>_self</c>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，与 <c>_self</c> 的作用相同。

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited string consisting of zero or more of the following options in the form <c>name=value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个逗号分隔的字符串，由以下零个或多个以 <c>name=value</c> 形式表现的选项组成。

trans-unit.source: Except for the <c>left</c>, <c>top</c>, <c>height</c>, and <c>width</c> options, which take arbitrary integers, each option accepts <c>yes</c> or <see langword="1" />, and <c>no</c> or <see langword="0" />, as valid values.
trans-unit.target: 除了采用随机整数的 <c>left</c>、<c>top</c>、<c>height</c> 和 <c>width</c> 选项，每个选项接受 <c>yes</c> 或 <see langword="1" /> 以及 <c>no</c> 或 <see langword="0" /> 作为有效值。

trans-unit.source: <c>channelmode</c>: Used with the deprecated channels technology of Internet Explorer 4.0.
trans-unit.target: <c>channelmode</c>：与被否决的 Internet Explorer 4.0 通道技术一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>no</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>no</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>directories</c>: Whether the window should display directory navigation buttons.
trans-unit.target: <c>directories</c>：窗口是否应显示目录导航按钮。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>height</c>: The height of the window's client area, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <c>height</c>：窗口工作区的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The minimum is 100; attempts to open a window smaller than this will cause the window to open according to the Internet Explorer defaults.
trans-unit.target: 最小为 100 个像素；尝试打开小于此标准的窗口时，将根据 Internet Explorer 默认设置打开窗口。

trans-unit.source: <c>left</c>: The left (x-coordinate) position of the window, relative to the upper-left corner of the user's screen, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <c>left</c>：窗口的左边（x 坐标）位置（以像素为单位），相对于用户屏幕的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Must be a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 必须是一个正整数。

trans-unit.source: <c>location</c>: Whether to display the Address bar, which enables users to navigate the window to a new URL.
trans-unit.target: <c>location</c>：是否显示地址栏，它可以使用户将窗口导航到新的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>menubar</c>: Whether to display menus on the new window.
trans-unit.target: <c>menubar</c>：是否在新窗口上显示菜单。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>resizable</c>: Whether the window can be resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: <c>resizable</c>：用户是否可以调整窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>scrollbars</c>: Whether the window has horizontal and vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: <c>scrollbars</c>：窗口是否具有水平滚动条和垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>status</c>: Whether the window has a status bar at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: <c>status</c>：窗口底部是否具有状态栏。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>titlebar</c>: Whether the title of the current page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <c>titlebar</c>：是否显示当前页的标题。

trans-unit.source: Setting this option to <c>no</c> has no effect within a managed application; the title bar will always appear.
trans-unit.target: 将此选项设置为 <c>no</c> 在托管应用程序内无效；始终都会显示标题栏。

trans-unit.source: <c>toolbar</c>: Whether toolbar buttons such as **Back**, **Forward**, and **Stop** are visible.
trans-unit.target: <c>toolbar</c>：工具栏按钮（例如“后退”、“前进”和“停止”）是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>top</c>: The top (y-coordinate) position of the window, relative to the upper-left corner of the user's screen, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <c>top</c>：窗口的上端（y 坐标）位置（以像素为单位），相对于用户屏幕的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Must be a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 必须是一个正整数。

trans-unit.source: <c>width</c>: The width of the window's client area, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <c>width</c>：窗口工作区的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The minimum is 100; attempts to open a window smaller than this will cause the window to open according to the Internet Explorer defaults.
trans-unit.target: 最小为 100 个像素；尝试打开小于此标准的窗口时，将根据 Internet Explorer 默认设置打开窗口。

trans-unit.source: Whether <c>url</c> replaces the current window's URL in the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <c>url</c> 是否替换导航历史记录中当前窗口的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This will effect the operation of methods on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlHistory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 这将对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlHistory" /> 类的方法的操作产生影响。

trans-unit.source: Displays a file in the named window.
trans-unit.target: 在已命名的窗口中显示文件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> representing the new window, or the previously created window named by the <paramref name="target" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 表示新窗口的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" />，或者是以前创建的、由 <paramref name="target" /> 参数命名的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `target`参数可以名称创建的以前调用的结果为一个窗口<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 参数也可以指向通过单击超链接打开的窗口 (`A`元素) 或`FORM`用元素`TARGET`特性在新窗口中打开其 URL。

trans-unit.source: The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it:
trans-unit.target: 以下 HTML 代码将打开一个名为的新窗口`orderWindow`当用户单击它：

trans-unit.source: If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的任何选项`windowOptions`参数，不包含任何选项会自动禁用。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，如果您仅通过指定`windowOptions`要包含状态栏中，则菜单栏、 工具栏、 标题、 滚动条等将不会显示除非你显式启用它们通过`windowOptions`。

trans-unit.source: If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用的文件`url`是某一 HTML 文件、 文本文件或其他可以在 Internet Explorer 内承载的文件类型它将在已命名的窗口中显示。

trans-unit.source: If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能在 Internet Explorer 内显示的文件和名为的目标窗口不存在，则窗口将打开仅足够长的时间 Internet Explorer 下载资源;它将立即关闭之后。

trans-unit.source: When you create new windows using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>, it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建新的 windows 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>，它将导致 HTML 文档对象模型，以便打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you do not call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A> on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit.
trans-unit.target: 如果不调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A>上所有已创建的 windows，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态即使你的应用程序已退出。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>加载在现有窗口中，URL`windowOptions`将被忽略; 维度、 外观和屏幕位置首先由首次调用都将保留窗口<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Locator that describes the location of the file to load.
trans-unit.target: 描述要加载的文件位置的统一资源定位器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the window in which to open the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中打开资源的窗口的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be a developer-supplied name, or one of the following special values:
trans-unit.target: 它可以是开发人员提供的名称，或下列特殊值之一：

trans-unit.source: <c>_blank</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in a new window.
trans-unit.target: <c>_blank</c>在新窗口中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: Works the same as a call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew(System.String,System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 与调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew(System.String,System.String)" /> 作用相同。

trans-unit.source: <c>_media</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in the Media bar.
trans-unit.target: <c>_media</c>在“媒体”栏中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>_parent</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in the window that created the current window.
trans-unit.target: <c>_parent</c>在创建当前窗口的窗口中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>_search</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in the Search bar.
trans-unit.target: <c>_search</c>在“搜索”栏中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>_self</c>: Opens <c>url</c> in the current window.
trans-unit.target: <c>_self</c>在当前窗口中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>_top</c>: If called against a window belonging to a <c>FRAME</c> element, opens <c>url</c> in the window hosting its <c>FRAMESET</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>_top</c>：如果在属于 <c>FRAME</c> 元素的窗口上调用，则在承载其 <c>FRAMESET</c> 的窗口中打开 <c>url</c>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, acts the same as <c>_self</c>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，与 <c>_self</c> 的作用相同。

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited string consisting of zero or more of the following options in the form <c>name=value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个逗号分隔的字符串，由以下零个或多个以 <c>name=value</c> 形式表现的选项组成。

trans-unit.source: Except for the <c>left</c>, <c>top</c>, <c>height</c>, and <c>width</c> options, which take arbitrary integers, each option accepts <c>yes</c> or <see langword="1" />, and <c>no</c> or <see langword="0" />, as valid values.
trans-unit.target: 除了采用随机整数的 <c>left</c>、<c>top</c>、<c>height</c> 和 <c>width</c> 选项，每个选项接受 <c>yes</c> 或 <see langword="1" /> 以及 <c>no</c> 或 <see langword="0" /> 作为有效值。

trans-unit.source: <c>channelmode</c>: Used with the deprecated channels technology of Internet Explorer 4.0.
trans-unit.target: <c>channelmode</c>：与被否决的 Internet Explorer 4.0 通道技术一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>no</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>no</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>directories</c>: Whether the window should display directory navigation buttons.
trans-unit.target: <c>directories</c>：窗口是否应显示目录导航按钮。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>height</c>: The height of the window's client area, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <c>height</c>：窗口工作区的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The minimum is 100; attempts to open a window smaller than this will cause the window to open according to The Internet Explorer defaults.
trans-unit.target: 最小为 100 个像素；尝试打开小于此标准的窗口时，将根据 Internet Explorer 默认设置打开窗口。

trans-unit.source: <c>left</c>: The left (x-coordinate) position of the window, relative to the upper-left corner of the user's screen, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <c>left</c>：窗口的左边（x 坐标）位置（以像素为单位），相对于用户屏幕的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Must be a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 必须是一个正整数。

trans-unit.source: <c>location</c>: Whether to display the Address bar, which enables users to navigate the window to a new URL.
trans-unit.target: <c>location</c>：是否显示地址栏，它可以使用户将窗口导航到新的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>menubar</c>: Whether to display menus on the new window.
trans-unit.target: <c>menubar</c>：是否在新窗口上显示菜单。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>resizable</c>: Whether the window can be resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: <c>resizable</c>：用户是否可以调整窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>scrollbars</c>: Whether the window has horizontal and vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: <c>scrollbars</c>：窗口是否具有水平滚动条和垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>status</c>: Whether the window has a status bar at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: <c>status</c>：窗口底部是否具有状态栏。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>titlebar</c>: Whether the title of the current page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <c>titlebar</c>：是否显示当前页的标题。

trans-unit.source: Setting this option to <c>no</c> has no effect within a managed application; the title bar will always appear.
trans-unit.target: 将此选项设置为 <c>no</c> 在托管应用程序内无效；始终都会显示标题栏。

trans-unit.source: <c>toolbar</c>: Whether toolbar buttons such as **Back**, **Forward**, and **Stop** are visible.
trans-unit.target: <c>toolbar</c>：工具栏按钮（例如“后退”、“前进”和“停止”）是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Default is <c>yes</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <c>yes</c>。

trans-unit.source: <c>top</c>: The top (y-coordinate) position of the window, relative to the upper-left corner of the user's screen, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <c>top</c>：窗口的上端（y 坐标）位置（以像素为单位），相对于用户屏幕的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Must be a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 必须是一个正整数。

trans-unit.source: <c>width</c>: The width of the window's client area, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <c>width</c>：窗口工作区的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The minimum is 100; attempts to open a window smaller than this will cause the window to open according to The Internet Explorer defaults.
trans-unit.target: 最小为 100 个像素；尝试打开小于此标准的窗口时，将根据 Internet Explorer 默认设置打开窗口。

trans-unit.source: Whether <c>url</c> replaces the current window's URL in the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <c>url</c> 是否替换导航历史记录中当前窗口的 URL。

trans-unit.target: 这将对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlHistory" /> 类的方法的操作产生影响。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains two methods:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含两个方法：

trans-unit.source: The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed.
trans-unit.target: 第一个将在名为的窗口中打开 URL `displayWindow`，这便会创建的状态栏显示。

trans-unit.source: The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 第二个在相同的窗口中，打开另一个 URL，但指定应显示仅位置栏。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first.
trans-unit.target: 请注意窗口和显示控件的维度取决于在其上第一次打开 URL。

trans-unit.source: The code example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例要求你的窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: When you create new windows using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>, it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建新的 windows 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>，它将导致 HTML 文档对象模型，以便打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you do not call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A> on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit.
trans-unit.target: 如果不调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A>上所有已创建的 windows，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态即使你的应用程序已退出。

trans-unit.source: If you want to load a document into a previously opened window, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要将文档加载到先前打开的窗口，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Locator that describes the location of the file to load.
trans-unit.target: 描述要加载的文件位置的统一资源定位器。

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited string consisting of zero or more of the following options in the form <c>name=value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个逗号分隔的字符串，由以下零个或多个以 <c>name=value</c> 形式表现的选项组成。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> for a full description of the valid options.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效选项的完整描述，请参见 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays a file in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 在新窗口中显示文件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> representing the new window.
trans-unit.target: 表示新窗口的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用的文件`url`是某一 HTML 文件、 文本文件或其他可以在 Internet Explorer 内承载的文件类型将在新窗口中显示。

trans-unit.source: If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不显示在 Internet Explorer 内，则将会打开窗口仅足够长的时间 Internet Explorer 下载资源;它将立即关闭之后。

trans-unit.source: When you create new windows using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>, it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建新的 windows 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>，它将导致 HTML 文档对象模型，以便打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you do not call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A> on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit.
trans-unit.target: 如果不调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Close%2A>上所有已创建的 windows，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态即使你的应用程序已退出。

trans-unit.source: If you want to load a document into a previously opened window, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要将文档加载到先前打开的窗口，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the window which resides above the current one in a page containing frames.
trans-unit.target: 获取驻留在包含框架的页中当前窗口上面的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" /> that owns the current window.
trans-unit.target: 拥有当前窗口的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: If the current window is not a <c>FRAME</c>, or is not embedded inside of a <c>FRAME</c>, it returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前窗口不<c>帧</c>，或者没有嵌入内<c>帧</c>，它将返回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: In a document containing frames, each `FRAME` within a `FRAMESET` acts as a separate child window on the page.
trans-unit.target: 文档中包含的帧，每个`FRAME`内`FRAMESET`充当页上的单独的子窗口。

trans-unit.source: The parent of each `FRAME` is the `FRAMESET` which contains the `FRAME`.
trans-unit.target: 每个父`FRAME`是`FRAMESET`其中包含`FRAME`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the window's client area on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取屏幕上窗口工作区的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> describing the x -and y-coordinates of the top-left corner of the screen, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，描述屏幕左上角的 x 和 y 坐标（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control will return the position of the control relative to the upper-left corner of the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件将返回相对于窗口左上角的窗体控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Position%2A> will return the location of the document's display area relative to the top-left corner of the user's monitor.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Position%2A>将返回相对于用户的监视器的左上角的文档的显示区域的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens a new window directly over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control on the form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开一个新窗口直接通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>窗体上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The code example requires that your form contains an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例要求你的窗体包含的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: The message to display to the user.
trans-unit.target: 要显示给用户的消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value displayed in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 文本框中显示的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Shows a dialog box that displays a message and a text box to the user.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个对话框，该对话框向用户显示一条消息和一个文本框。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示用户输入的文本。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Prompt%2A> provides a quick, easy way to obtain simple text input from the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Prompt%2A> 提供一种快速、 简单的方法，以获得用户的简单文本输入。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Prompt%2A> accepts Unicode text as input, the Internet Explorer script prompt will not display non-Latin language text appropriately on Windows 95, Windows 98, Windows ME or Windows NT due to operating system limitations.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Prompt%2A>接受 Unicode 文本作为输入，Internet Explorer 脚本提示符上将不显示非拉丁语言文本适当 Windows 95、 Windows 98、 Windows ME 或 Windows NT 由于操作系统限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [INFO: Internet Explorer Script Prompts and MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[信息： Internet Explorer 脚本将提示和 MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147)。

trans-unit.source: Takes focus off of the current window.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点从当前窗口上移走。

trans-unit.source: When called on a `FRAME` window in a `FRAMESET`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.RemoveFocus%2A> will cause that window to lose focus, but it will not automatically set focus on another window.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`FRAME`中的窗口`FRAMESET`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.RemoveFocus%2A>将导致该窗口来失去焦点，但它不会自动设置焦点在另一个窗口上。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user uses the mouse to change the dimensions of the window.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标更改窗口的尺寸时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Resize> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Resize>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> named `HtmlWindow1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>名为`HtmlWindow1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Resize> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Resize>事件。

trans-unit.source: Changes the size of the window to the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口的大小更改为指定的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> describing the desired width and height of the window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，描述窗口所需的宽度和高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Must be 100 pixels or more in both dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 宽度和高度都必须大于等于 100 个像素。

trans-unit.source: Changes the size of the window to the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口的大小更改为指定的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens a new window, and resizes it to fill the available screen area.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将打开一个新窗口，并调整其大小以填充可用的屏幕区域。

trans-unit.source: The window you are trying to resize is in a different domain than its parent window.
trans-unit.target: 尝试调整大小的窗口与其父窗口在不同的域中。

trans-unit.source: This restriction is part of cross-frame scripting security; for more information, see [About Cross-Frame Scripting and Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533028.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 此限制是跨框架脚本安全的一部分；有关更多信息，请参见 [About Cross-Frame Scripting and Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533028.aspx)（关于跨框架脚本编写和安全性）。

trans-unit.source: Describes the desired width of the window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 描述窗口所需的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Must be 100 pixels or more.
trans-unit.target: 必须大于等于 100 个像素。

trans-unit.source: Describes the desired height of the window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 描述窗口所需的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Must be 100 pixels or more.
trans-unit.target: 必须大于等于 100 个像素。

trans-unit.source: Changes the size of the window to the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口的大小更改为指定的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The window you are trying to resize is in a different domain than its parent window.
trans-unit.target: 尝试调整大小的窗口与其父窗口在不同的域中。

trans-unit.source: This restriction is part of cross-frame scripting security; for more information, see [About Cross-Frame Scripting and Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533028.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 此限制是跨框架脚本安全的一部分；有关更多信息，请参见 [About Cross-Frame Scripting and Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533028.aspx)（关于跨框架脚本编写和安全性）。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user scrolls through the window to view off-screen text.
trans-unit.target: 当用户滚动窗口以查看屏幕外的文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> named `HtmlWindow1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>名为`HtmlWindow1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the window to the designated position.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口滚动到指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-coordinates, relative to the top-left corner of the current window, toward which the page should scroll.
trans-unit.target: 页面应该滚动到的 x 和 y 坐标，相对于当前窗口的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Moves the window to the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口移动到指定的坐标。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.ScrollTo%2A> will cause the document to scroll so that the specified coordinate on the document is located in the upper-left corner of the document's window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.ScrollTo%2A> 将导致要向下滚动，以便在文档上的指定的坐标位于文档的窗口的左上角的文档。

trans-unit.source: If the document is not long or wide enough for this to happen, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.ScrollTo%2A> will scroll through the document as far as possible in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文档不是长或不够宽，这种情况，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.ScrollTo%2A>将按指定的方向尽可能文档中滚动。

trans-unit.source: The following code example scrolls through the document to the coordinate position clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例滚动到用户单击的坐标位置的文档。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate, relative to the top-left corner of the current window, toward which the page should scroll.
trans-unit.target: 页面应该滚动到的 x 坐标，相对于当前窗口的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate, relative to the top-left corner of the current window, toward which the page should scroll.
trans-unit.target: 页面应该滚动到的 y 坐标，相对于当前窗口的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the window to the designated position.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口滚动到指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.ScrollTo%2A> will cause the document to scroll so that the specified coordinate on the document is located in the upper-left corner of the document's window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.ScrollTo%2A> 将导致要向下滚动，以便在文档上的指定的坐标位于文档的窗口的左上角的文档。

trans-unit.source: If the document is not long or wide enough for this to happen, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.ScrollTo%2A> will scroll through the document as far as possible in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文档不是长或不够宽，这种情况，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.ScrollTo%2A>将按指定的方向尽可能文档中滚动。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the current window.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> describing the size of the window in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，描述窗口的大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the status bar of a window.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在窗口的状态栏中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the current status text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，它包含当前状态文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control does not display a status bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件不显示状态栏。

trans-unit.source: Any new window that you open with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A> methods, however, will display a status bar by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用打开任何新窗口<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.OpenNew%2A>方法，但是，默认会显示状态栏。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current page is unloading, and a new page is about to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当正在卸载当前页，而一个新页即将显示时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Unload> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Unload>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow> named `HtmlWindow1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>名为`HtmlWindow1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Unload> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Unload>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL corresponding to the current item displayed in the window.
trans-unit.target: 获取对应于窗口中显示的当前项的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> describing the URL.
trans-unit.target: 描述 URL 的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: To navigate the window to a new document, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Navigate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要导航到新文档窗口，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Navigate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the frame element corresponding to this window.
trans-unit.target: 获取对应于此窗口的框架元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> corresponding to this window's <c>FRAME</c> element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />对应于此窗口<c>帧</c>元素。

trans-unit.source: If this window is not a frame, it returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此窗口不是框架，它将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When you retrieve a `FRAME` element from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Frames%2A> collection, it returns an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>.
trans-unit.target: 当检索`FRAME`元素从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Frames%2A>集合，它返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.WindowFrameElement%2A> on this object if you need to access attributes of the underlying `FRAME` element, such as the `SRC` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.WindowFrameElement%2A>对此对象，如果你需要访问的基础属性`FRAME`元素，如`SRC`属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example compares the `SRC` attribute of frames in a `FRAMESET` to the current location.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例进行比较`SRC`属性中的帧`FRAMESET`与当前的位置。

trans-unit.source: If they are different, the frames are reset to their original URLs.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们不同，帧重置为其原始 Url。

trans-unit.source: You cannot access a <c>FRAME</c> elements or the <c>FRAME</c>'s document if the <c>FRAME</c> is in a different zone than the <c>FRAMESET</c> that contains it.
trans-unit.target: 无法访问<c>帧</c>元素或<c>帧</c>的文档如果<c>帧</c>位于不同区域比<c>框架集</c>，其中包含它。

trans-unit.source: For a full explanation, see [About Cross-Frame Scripting and Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533028.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整说明，请参阅[有关跨框架脚本和安全](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533028.aspx)。
